channel.title: MW3 : Ghost
channel.description:
Okay there is probably a lot of talk about MW3 and Ghost. I saw both sides of this argument and I think I believe that he is still alive. I will not tell you why I think that, but i do.
[size=18pt]Rumors[/size]
[ul][li]Ghost was caught on fire along with roach [/li] [li]Ghost died from Shepard shooting him[/li] [li]Ghost is actually Gaz in disguise[/li] [li]Ghost was never real?[/li][/ul]
These are the major things I have heard from people weather it on a forums or on youtube. I just want to get some members from this community to pitch in what they think. Discuss :D

item.title: MW3 : Ghost
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:17, topic:418487”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=521028.msg3787142#msg3787142 date=1318978501]

Ghost is a fictional character. Anything and everything will be possible. I don’t particularly care either way… i dont play the campaigns, only my sister does that

True.

Lets be honest, not only was Gaz shot in the head in cod4 (lulz spoiler alertz), he would’ve had a little to no chance of surviving that, but the MW2 campaign proved to me that Infinity Ward was no longer capable of creating a story with such a dramatic coverup such as Ghost really being Gaz. While it would be fucking awesome, it’s simply just not realistic. And to be 100% honest, lets see you get lit on fire, and then shot and live through it!

well watching the ending over and over roach was only covered with the liquid not ghost but idk :s

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kp7z1yW2VFY
Pause at 2:30 and you see fire coming from ghosts body.

tabby you have to remember this is from a first person view your getting burned at so the game may have made it look like your eyes are on fire too like no joke. It is really hard to tell what is on fire and what isn’t. I will stick to me theory of Ghost only being shot and later being found or something along those lines but on November 8th we will find out
[/quote]
The only way Ghost could of survived is if he was in business with Shepard. But why would he want to fake death? All I know is that no one has seen his face? He could be Makarov for all we know[/quote]

Well a famous rumor that has been going around is that when gaz was shot, in order to protect his identity (saying he never died) he made up an alternate personality (ghost) and wears the mask to cover the wound/scar in which he was shot at. just a theory but could possibly make sense.
